where rownum between #{criteria.startRow} and #{criteria.endRow}

select no
, replace(replace(content,'\r\n',''),'\r','') content , subject , writer , location , recommand , date_format(dates,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') dates , business_nm , business_type , hit , secret from eventzone where no = #{no}
